newsitem.title: USA: SyQuest starts shipping new computer drives.
newsitem.headline: SyQuest starts shipping new computer drives.

text.p: SyQuest Technology Inc said it has begun shipping its new SyJet removable cartridge hard drive that has a storage capacity of 1.5 gigabytes.
The company already has a company record $26 million backlog of orders for the new product, it said in a statement.
In addition, Syquest said it is now shipping its EZFlyer 230 drives and cartridges, as well as the SyJet drives, to Chinese computer distributor Legend Group.
Syquest ended trading on Tuesday up 4/32 at 2-9/32 with over 5.8 million shares changing hands.
